aggregation_type.description: Specifies the type of aggregating data for analysis.

ranges.description: A set of ranges, each representing a bucket. Note that this aggregation includes the 'from' value and excludes the 'to' value for each range.

min_interval_population.description: The minimum number of items in the bin required for the bin to be returned.

max_num_intervals.description: Maximum number of intervals to return for a given facet.
